job.title: Staff Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: the staff machine learning engineer will set the technical direction of their team to build and deploy machine learning solutions they will work closely with product and engineering partners in the development of the solutionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtwhat you get to do every dayltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt design and test machine learning models to create highly accurate an innovator in the space by bringing passion and new ideas to work every day ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtwhat you bring to the roleltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt quantitative degree ltligtltligt years experience in building and evaluating machine learning ampamp deep learning models ltligtltligt years experience putting machine learning models into production ltligtltligt years experience designing computer vision models in a commercial setting ltligtltligt experience with big data tools apache beam spark etc ltligtltligt experience with cloud technologies such as awsgcp ltligtltligt high degree of familiarity with sklearn tensorflowkeras pytorch ltligtltligt fluency in python ltbrgtltligtltulgtthe realreal is the worlds largest online marketplace for authenticated resale luxury goods with more than million members with a rigorous authentication process overseen by experts the realreal provides a safe and reliable platform for consumers to buy and sell their luxury items we have hundreds of inhouse gemologists horologists and brand authenticators who inspect thousands of items each day as a sustainable company we give new life to pieces by thousands of brands across numerous categoriesincluding womens and mens fashion fine jewelry and watches art and homein support of the circular economy we make selling effortless with free virtual appointments inhome pickup dropoff and direct shipping we do all of the work for consignors including authenticating using ai and machine learning to determine optimal pricing photographing and listing their items as well as handling shipping and customer service at our retail locations including our eight shoppable stores customers can sell meet with our experts and receive free valuationsltbrgtltbrgtthe
